idea:
Digital, analytics, AI & Machine learning are taking over industries in a big way. The key for organizations to succeed is either upgrade or perish. The fin-tech products in the Ascent ecosystem have revolutionized the operations and quality standards of many leaders in the banking, finance & allied industries. 

Ascent's offerings as a cutting edge enterprise platform for financial control & regulatory compliance.

With a deep understanding of the global economy and markets, Ascent ensures that our clients stay ahead of the seismic changes brought by the rapid development of cutting-edge fintech. We enable this through a host of different innovations, leveraging our considerable expertise in the worlds of machine-learning and AI. 

We also strive to stay invested in our clientsâ€™ requirements by not only providing digitally disruptive products to suit their myriad needs, but also through diligent diagnosis and analysis of pain points on a client-by-client basis. This achieves both operational excellence and assures them a remarkable degree of savings. 

Our products are built on proprietary software designed & developed by experts with over 200 years of cumulative experience & expertise.
name: Kinolve Software India

idea: We are working to provide a Plant based superior alternative to Dairy. Pilk ( Plant based milk) will have superior nutrient profile to dairy and the same taste, texture and other sensory properties of dairy. We are aiming to replace dairy in a more sustainable and healthier way.

idea:
HSE INTEGRO is a complete solution of Health Safety & Environment. Majorly operates with 2 divisions namely Fire & Safety. Focus is to create awareness amongst workplaces in India for Fire & Safety via trainings, audits & consulting using technologies like VR & Digital training medium like LMS.

The fire division offers Fire installation projects and AMC.

Mumbai as HQ & Delhi as the 1st branch office catering Pan  India. Team strength - 95 Pax.
name: HSE INTEGRO PRIVATE LIMITED
